attributes.action: increase the level of tax free severance from £30k to £60k
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current level of tax free severance amount of £30k has been in force for a number of decades.  In the current climate where redundancies are on the increase and employment is hard to obtain, individuals need the extra cash so their options are open in helping them in case of long period of unemployment or if they wish to start-up a business.
